DOC.brief_summary: To determine pharmacokinetics 2 intranasal dose 1 oral dose naltrexone compare intramuscular dose naltrexone .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Evaluation Intranasal , Intramuscular , Oral Naltrexone Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Males females 18 55 year age , inclusive . Provide write informed consent . BMI range 18 30 kg/m2 , inclusive . Adequate venous access . No clinically significant concurrent medical condition determine medical history , physical examination , clinical laboratory examination , vital sign , 12lead ECG . Male subject must agree use acceptable method contraception female partner well donate sperm throughout study 90 day last study drug administration . Female subject childbearing potential must agree use acceptable method birth control throughout study 30 day last study drug administration . Oral contraceptive prohibit . Agree ingest alcohol , drink contain xanthine > 500 mg/day ( e.g. , Coca ColaÂ® , coffee , tea , etc . ) , grapefruit/grapefruit juice . Participate strenuous exercise 72 hour prior admission last blood draw study . Please contact site information
